__e: It may be all the rage now, but in a very short time it can become an affront to the eyes.
Your money is an insult to their sacrifice.
You are a human affront to all women, and I am a woman.
No offense, but I was the best, I finished on top.
no offense, but i could not be with someone like you.
No offense or anything, but to me, it was just a trip.
But they sense an insult, and can hate even better than they can love.
- Once defamatory sentence and you'll end up naked.
Give a man an insult, he can hurt people for a day.
